definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
(of a lazy or incompetent teacher) to hamper students' progress/(of media) to propagate errors/to lead people astray
child of a Manchu bannerman family (nobility)/(fig.) privileged brat

sentences.english: The fourth section analysis the literary work of people who walk into political field by examination.
sentences.chinese: 第四节分析评述科举入仕之工商子弟的文学创作活动。

sentences.english: Children of the rescue work continued, suddenly heard "help" the voice shouted.
sentences.chinese: 子弟们继续着救援工作，突然听到“救命”的呼喊声。

sentences.english: When you look at the books, you see he is just one of a hundred students or whatever.
sentences.chinese: 你看看账本就会明白他只是众多富家子弟中的一员。

sentences.english: He is a lewd of a dandy, but admits skill, shrewd.
sentences.chinese: 他固然是个好色的纨绔子弟，但身手矫捷，精明能干。

sentences.english: People's army, the hearts of the people is always the most lovable person.
sentences.chinese: 人民的子弟兵，永远是人民心中最可爱的人。

sentences.english: It also contained obscenities and angry denunciations of "rich kids."
sentences.chinese: 内容仍是对“富家子弟”的愤怒指责和辱骂。

sentences.english: The bear leader bear-led a group of wealthy young men on a cross-country hike.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教师带领一组富家子弟作越野远足。

sentences.english: The heroic deeds of the people's soldiers are too numerous to enumerate.
sentences.chinese: 人民子弟兵的事迹举不胜举。

sentences.english: The future belongs to the dandy. It is the exquisites who are going to rule.
sentences.chinese: 未来属于花花公子，而正是这些纨裤子弟将执掌权柄。

sentences.english: A fairy lady fell in love with a peasant boy.
sentences.chinese: 一个仙女爱上了一个农家子弟。

sentences.english: You will see migrants’ schools closed.
sentences.chinese: 你会见到民工子弟学校被关。

sentences.english: Your child will be the first batch to take the NSS courses.
sentences.chinese: 贵子弟将为第一批修讀新高中课程之学生。

sentences.english: The third part is to examine migrant children school teachers teaching life styles.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，民工子弟学校教师教学生活方式的检视。

sentences.english: The above four points are main ways to their offsprings'education problems.
sentences.chinese: 这是明清侨寓徽商子弟教育问题解决的四个主要途径。

sentences.english: Xie'an, a character in Shishuoxinyu (Anecdotes of Famous Houses in Wei and Jin Dynasties) attaches great importance to the education of the young of the house.
sentences.chinese: 谢安是《世说新语》中最重视教育家族子弟的人物。

sentences.english: This shows that the people's army is truly a great wall of steel guarding the Party and the country.
sentences.chinese: 这表明，人民子弟兵真正是党和国家的钢铁长城。

definition: collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
direct line of descent/under one's personal command/school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
father and elder brother(s)/head of the family/patriarch
offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
